Tables Utils

Utility functions to log to W&B Tables. For a full guide to data visualisation using W&B Tables, see the Tables docs here

{% raw %}

log_df_as_tables[source]

log_df_as_tables(df, table_name:str='my_table')

Logs a dataframe as a W&B Table to W&B, wandb.init() must be called before using this function.

Parameters:

  • df : <class 'inspect._empty'>

    Dataframe to be logged

  • table_name : <class 'str'>, optional

    Name to give the W&B Table

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Artifacts Utils

Utility functions for Weights & Biases Artifacts, see the W&B Artifacts docs here for a full guide to Artifacts

{% raw %}

log_to_artifacts[source]

log_to_artifacts(path_to_data, artifact_name, artifact_type:str='dataset', log:str='file')

Logs a file or directory as an artifact, wandb.init() must be called before using this function.

Parameters:

  • path_to_data : <class 'inspect._empty'>

    Path to file or directory to be logged

  • artifact_name : <class 'inspect._empty'>

    Name of the W&B Artifact

  • artifact_type : <class 'str'>, optional

    Type of artifact, defined by user, e.g. "model", "raw-dataset" etc (default: dataset)

  • log : <class 'str'>, optional

    Type of data being logged, can be "file" or "dir"

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}
